name: Lester EADDY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE; Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of March, 2004, the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
